body:
Hiya everyone, I don't recall a forum thread of "Role Models", so I decided to make one! Title explains it's self.

So who is your Role Model in Avicus? :D
body_tagged:
Hiya everyone, I don't recall a forum thread of "Role Models", so I decided to make one! Title explains it's self.

So who is your Role Model in Avicus? :D
title: Role Models in Avicus ! :D

replies.body:
There's been a thread for "Avicus Idol," "Who you look up to in Avicus," and "Avicus Inspiration.." Lol. But anyways.

I look up to Evocal because he always seems open to others, he's very genuine, works hard, creates amazing maps, and isn't afraid to speak up. He is quite active in the community and is very friendly to new players and old friends :)
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
There's only one person I look up to, this person has shown character, priority and inspiration. 
Who is this person? 
Jozz. '
Hands down, Best Moderator Ever. He is the only one who has ever responded to my reports and told me to give me a nice feeling. Not once, not twice, not thrice, but flipping 12 times. Seriously, how is he not Sr. Mod yet? 
Every time we play together with some other people, he always "brb's" to go check on reports. His gameplay is less important than reports. That shows massive character. His strength as a Mod is really showcased as he responds to reports and tells the reporter! 
Always and forever,
#JozzforSrmod
replies.body_tagged:
There's only one person I look up to, this person has shown character, priority and inspiration. 
Who is this person? 
Jozz. '
Hands down, Best Moderator Ever. He is the only one who has ever responded to my reports and told me to give me a nice feeling. Not once, not twice, not thrice, but flipping 12 times. Seriously, how is he not Sr. Mod yet? 
Every time we play together with some other people, he always "brb's" to go check on reports. His gameplay is less important than reports. That shows massive character. His strength as a Mod is really showcased as he responds to reports and tells the reporter! 
Always and forever,
#JozzforSrmod

replies.body: Hayden. He is the most inspirational person I've met on Avicus. He was one of the people that helped me the most to stop playing MC, and start making the most of my life. I've always looked up to Hayden, and he's made me a better person. ily Hayden <3

replies.body:
It has to be jozzmcozz. He is one of the most dedicated and friendliest mods. Every couple of minutes he says "brb got to check on reports". He is one of the few mods that ever respond to my reports and he is always there as a friendly help. If anyone ever deserves senior mod it has to be jozz. He is never too serious or too immature.

He seems to have the inability to loose his cool, no matter what the situation which is something most of us lack. He is also a fantastic player, both amazing at pvp and helpful to team mates. 

Because of this, it has to be jozz.
replies.body_tagged:
It has to be jozzmcozz. He is one of the most dedicated and friendliest mods. Every couple of minutes he says "brb got to check on reports". He is one of the few mods that ever respond to my reports and he is always there as a friendly help. If anyone ever deserves senior mod it has to be jozz. He is never too serious or too immature.

He seems to have the inability to loose his cool, no matter what the situation which is something most of us lack. He is also a fantastic player, both amazing at pvp and helpful to team mates. 

Because of this, it has to be jozz.

replies.body:
Im going to have to disagree/agree with everyone here.
Jozz is IMO the most active mod, but that isnt all that it takes to meet the requirements for Sr.moderator.
But besides that, jozz told me something the other day that broke me apart.
Im not allowed to share what it is, but for that reason, I look up to him.
I remember way back when, he ALWAYS looked up to me.
I was like his mother or something, and I watched him flourish, he then overcame me in both PVP and moderating.
And now I look up to him
He also motivates me, non stop, 24/7
replies.body_tagged:

And now I look up to him
He also motivates me, non stop, 24/7

replies.body:
PeachyYas: Hes a really kind guy who always does his job. I want to become a moderator soon and he is someone who is serious and carries out his duties. He really makes me want to get his killstreaks too. I want to get as good as him in pvp and be able to help anyone easily just as he does. 

I have other role models as well, but Peachy is my top role model

replies.body:
Ugh shut up, this isnt the "who do you like" thread its "who do you look up to" and if nobody looks upto you  begging for votes and being some annoying parasite to a thread will not help. Nobody dislikes you, but nobody looks up to you because you havnt done anything that makes people want to. Most people listed in this thread are staff and those that are not are either very skilled people who have shown off their skill to he person saying them or they are people that have helped that specific person with some problem. 

@gibbo thanks :)

@OP i dont have anyone on avicus that i look up to, but for my life i look up to Rami Ismail. Hes an independent games developer with company Vlambeer, a two man company, and he has done more to help the gamin world than anyone else i can think of. He created the Indie mega booth and still helps run it, he is a massive activist against sexism and against all forms of discrimination both in the games scene and in life. You can check him out on twitter @tha_rami. 
One thing i also love about him is that he is dedicated to his fans. He will answer basically any question that he can, respond to tweets, and he has an ask.fm account which he answers many questions on daily. He has shown me a lot of ways that the world can be improved, and had private conversations with me on some of it, and he is what made me the activist person i am today.

@australia and their bs refugee crap that they are doing: Holy hell stop (sorry for offtopic but what the hell australia)

@gibbo thanks :)

@OP i dont have anyone on avicus that i look up to, but for my life i look up to Rami Ismail. Hes an independent games developer with company Vlambeer, a two man company, and he has done more to help the gamin world than anyone else i can think of. He created the Indie mega booth and still helps run it, he is a massive activist against sexism and against all forms of discrimination both in the games scene and in life. You can check him out on twitter @tha_rami. 
One thing i also love about him is that he is dedicated to his fans. He will answer basically any question that he can, respond to tweets, and he has an ask.fm account which he answers many questions on daily. He has shown me a lot of ways that the world can be improved, and had private conversations with me on some of it, and he is what made me the activist person i am today.

@australia and their bs refugee crap that they are doing: Holy hell stop (sorry for offtopic but what the hell australia)

replies.body:
No one at all.
Half of the community disgusts me through their bias towards the regulars and hate towards others. If a random posts a post explaining why they disagree in a ranty way it's guaranteed a response of "don't start a flame war". If a regular does it people say "lol" and other things.

After hearing what some of the higher up moderators do and seeing what I do I lost pretty much all respect for the staff team here, excluding some staff members I've talked to.

replies.body: I'd have to liisstt.... Iz, LuckyTiger, Crazy_Clownz, Boss, Killerbye and Pinkyice. There's most likely more I'm not thinking of but its late. These guys taught me that pvp wasn't all just about killing people who would rage and try to get back at you for deaths. Grace_Starshard was the one that introduced me to MCZone which actually got me into pvp so I gotta add her into there as well. Nitai for being one of the few people my age that plays on the server and being so friendly. And xcrunner67. That guy is the sole reason why I became an above average archer/sniper to begin with. I wanted to be as good as he was.

replies.body:
My role model is AwarriorVenom,

he was able to keep a EXTREMELY popular  thread alive for 8 months. He unfortunately decided to let it go because he had enough of it.

abd because he created a texture pack mashup that A LOT of refulars now use on the server ^-^



^Ok That was pretty lame (Its called a joke, before Hakniv comments and replies)


My real Idol would be Evocal for giving me determination regarding building stuff, teaching me how to copy and paste / rotate.. I really am thankful to him for that.

replies.body: Can you just, not?
replies.body_tagged: Can you just, not?

reply_to.body:
Oh my god, yes! I didn't want to say it, because i thought i was alone. That asshole thinks he is the f'in best at pvp or some stupid bs like that and he goes around the forums just postin thread that say things and im like "f the things you just said" and then hes like "oh no you didnt just fornicate the words that just came outta my mouth" and im like "I did, and their mother's" but i dont want to offend their mothers so i send them an apology, but he doesnt know that.

im getting sick and tired of opinions about things i have posted online being posted online, its like, use the forums for their intended purpose, which isme criticizing   you not the other way around. 

I think we need to start a campaign to ban him and all opinions i dont like from the forums, seriously. While we are at it lets go back in time and kill snowden. Dont know why, just for the hell of it. Ooh and all youtube commentors should be shot in the head when they click the post button. That will teach them, thinking without my permission!

yep guys, all of you, its a new law i just made, if you want to think you need to buy a thinking permit or get my permission and a free license within the next week. Otherwise if you are caught without a permit you are tortured to death on site. And everyone you have ever looked strangely at.

anyways yeah, im in total agreement with you. 

#theworst #banhakkniv2014 #killsnowden #downwithpacificism #thisis'merica  #banopinions #thoughtcrime #shootyoutubecommenters #waymorethan140char #done

replies.body:
NolanDalton. 

I've known Nolan for quite some time now and I can soundly say that he is one of the most active responsible mods I know.  Whenever I see a hacker I contact Nolan and he's there in a flash handling it. He is also one of the most friendly and nice people to talk to, whether it is over TS or Skype. I can honestly see Nolan getting Sr. Mod soon :)

replies.body:
"Just because someone has a shiny banhammer and authority, doesn't mean I have to look up to them"

Well that "shiny banhammer" keeps this server running smoothly, it allows normal players like yourself to enjoy a hacker free game. No you don't HAVE to look up to them, but it's not a bad thing to do. Mods take hours out of their own free time to help out this server. I think that's something worth looking up to.

Koo: AYY WURRIOR WUZZUP
Warrior: ERMM ERMMMMM DA SUN AND LIEK WE SHUD BILD SUMTHIN YYEYEY
Koo: yey
Koo: YEY
Koo: YEEYEYEYEYYEYEYEYE

They are just plain kewl. And always supportive :D

Love you guys <3

Tons of avicus players, sorry can't name all it's just too many :0

replies.body:
I look up to Jozzeh because if I ever get mod, I want to be just like him.

D00ZiE - Get some of dat luv suicide.

Ducksfanwaterloo - dodger is my name and combat logging is my game. Enough Said.

Mooch24 - Just when i start to feel smart, you put me back down into my place, ily bb.

Glichy1 - Always telling me that im a napkin. <3\

Merlinmaster - Gotta like that laugh.

Plaza - Always telling me that im a scrub and that i suck at pvp <3.

izjust4fun - Lets you play CTH on horses. <3<3<3<3

And last, but not least - my coffee table, i thank you for always stubbing my little toe on you, what could i do without you!
